product_name: The North Face Warm Zip-T Neck Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The moisture-wicking and quick-drying polyester blend fabric of the women's The North Face Warm Zip-T Neck top keeps you warm and comfortable during active pursuits. Fabric features FlashDry(TM) microparticles embedded in the fabric to dramatically improve dry time and breathability. Made of crushed coconut shells and crushed volcanic rock, the FlashDry fabric additive leads to faster dry times and will not wash out. You'll move without restriction thanks to the stretchy fabric and flat seams, which are designed to enhance motion. Quarter-length zipper ventilates instantly; next-to-skin fit. Closeout.
short_description: The moisture-wicking and quick-drying polyester blend fabric of the women's The North Face Warm Zip-T Neck top keeps you warm and comfortable during active pursuits.
